alfredsnippet.snippet:
(precise source unknown, but site is at http://www.ekkehard-friebe.de/sapere-1.htm)

"The blind acceptance of paradoxical mathematical conclusions is a symptom of, at best, a profoundly authoritarian culture, and at worst, the blatant worship of unreason: 'truths that transcend the human intelligence.' Sapere aude,"

- G. Walton, Winchester, U.K
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - On the Blind Acceptance of Paradoxical Mathematical Conclusions
